attributes.action: ensure that 6Music, the BBC digital radio station, is not closed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 6Music is a wonderful radio station that plays a selection of music that cannot be readily found anywhere else on the radio. It is an important platform for new music and perfectly exemplifies the BBC's public service duties. It is sadly being put at risk of closure under a current review by the BBC. It should not be closed.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
